title: ISHAQ A
text: only good for long time for others it is worst app.. i lost alot of money by using this app.. some time refreshing some time not exicute etc.. many problems are there in this app.. and you see more profit on your PL, But when you exit it it will less than the first amount and when you see the loss amount on your PL when exit it the loss amout is more than when you see first... if you put a target number the target will hit only the target number cross above not will hit even reach the target.

title: Mann Kothari
text: Easy and simple user interface but today I need a stock holding statment for a visa application. It is easy to get but it comes out like an unprofessional excel sheet no logo no header no footer. I called the customer service, but they said they couldn't help.
